definition: official records/grade (of goods)/file/records/shelves/slot/gap/crosspiece/classifier for crosspieces/classifier for events, affairs etc/Taiwan pr. [dang3]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: I really hate this. You know ?
sentences.chinese: 我实在恨透这档子事，懂了吗？

sentences.english: I didn't know twelve years later it would cause all this trouble.
sentences.chinese: 我当时根本想不到十二年后会弄出这档子事。

sentences.english: I always wonder how the person next to me is doing on his work.
sentences.chinese: 你老在想，旁边那家伙是怎么干那档子事的。

definition: one's employment/business/matter that needs to be settled/(northern dialect) (of a person) demanding/trying/troublesome/erhua variant of 事[shi4]/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1]
(dialect) critical juncture/crucial moment/Taiwan pr. [jie2 gu5 yan3]
erhua variant of 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
lit. there is not even the first stroke of the character 八 (idiom)/fig. things have not even begun to take shape/no sign of success yet
lit. wind and rain sweeping through the town (idiom)/fig. a big scandal/an uproar/the talk of the town
by coincidence/it so happened that/fortunately/against expectation
